author: CMS-ECAL-Trigger-Group
body:
This PR  fixes the issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/38964 created in CondTools/Ecal unittests by the merged PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38856. 

Two different unit tests were writing on the same local sqlite file, causing troubles. The output files are now unique.
title: Fixed misnamed files in EcalTPG unittest script
